resources.string: Personal home or office networks should not be added.
That permission was required for the app to work
There was an error while saving the network

1. Banja Luka WiFi is an android application which contains all the wifi networks in the city of Banja Luka

2. The application is intended for the mentioned city above.

3. The author of the application takes no responsibility for the networks added by the users.\n\n

4. All the networks added by the users are their responsibility and they confirm that the added network does not belong to a private house and/or office.

5. If someone wants to get their network removed, they can contact the administrator via email: igor@igorilic.net.

6. After it was confirmed that the network belongs to the user, it will be deleted.

7. The removal of a network can only happen after the update of an application has been published.

8. Data that the application collects from the user are their geo location and their unique device ID.

9. The application is free to use but has a banner on the main screen.

10. The author of the application can change this terms without any prior or later notification to the user.
